Module io.github.jonloucks.metalog.api
Package io.github.jonloucks.metalog.api

Interface Console

All Superinterfaces:
Filterable, Predicate<Meta>, Publisher, Subscriber
public interface Console extends Publisher, Subscriber, Filterable
Responsible for the special logging case of System out and System err It is both a Subscriber and Publisher

  • Field Details

    • CONTRACT

      static final io.github.jonloucks.contracts.api.Contract<Console> CONTRACT
      The Contract for the Console. It is replaceable for scenarios where the Console output needs to redirected from System err and System out
